DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate corneal stain contact lens instillation two different multi purpose solution .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Evaluation Two Multipurpose Solutions Regards Corneal Staining
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 yrs old Males females Any race ethnic background CL patient use ( multipurpose solution ) MPS Patients use Acuvue 2 lens Corneal refractive surgery within 6 month study . Contact lens use day examination . Corneal ectasia . Current use Restasis
